title: Megan Womens Bike Short, Gym & Yoga Short, Wide Waistband, Flexible Movement
features: Megan Bike Shorts are ideal for the Gym, Yoga, Lounging, or Under Dresses and Skirts
Finally! An Adult Sized Bike Short based on Lucky & Me's Best Selling Jada Girls Bike Shorts. Now Mommy can match Outfits with her Little Girl!
5.5” Inseam featuring a Wide Waistband for Tummy Control without digging or rolling, and a Double Layer Gusset for Added Comfort
Super Soft Tri-blend Fabric: Cotton (55%), Modal (36%) and Spandex (9%) + Machine Washable = Retains shape and color wash after wash
A Lightweight feel as well as Extra Stretch, Durability, and Absolutely No Show-Through!
description: Smooth things over with flatlock-seamed shorts that are designed to stay put and flex with your every move. Our Megan Bike Shorts are ideal for the gym, yoga, lounging, or under dresses and skirts. They feature a wide waistband for tummy control without digging or rolling, and a double layer gusset for added comfort. A super-soft tri-blend fabric creates a lightweight feel as well as extra stretch, durability, and absolutely no show-through.
Super soft tri-blend fabric: Cotton (55%), Modal (36%) and Spandex (9%)
Machine Washable - retains shape and color wash after wash

At Annelle, we believe comfort is essential--no matter your age. We craft high-quality everyday basics that fit seamlessly into the lives of every tween, teen, and woman. From underwear to loungewear, Annelle provides timeless styles in fabrics so soft you’ll want to live in them.
“Annelle” combines the names of our founder, Rochelle, and her daughter, Annika. It’s a celebration of the connection between mother and daughter, and the love of comfort that they share.
